stories.original_headline: Next gen cancer drug shows surprising anti aging power
stories.original_summary: A next-generation drug tested in yeast was found to extend lifespan and slow aging by influencing a major growth-control pathway. Researchers also uncovered an unexpected role for agmatinases, enzymes that help keep this pathway in balance. Diet and gut microbes may affect aging more than expected b
stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Brew Elixir of Youth from Humble Fungi!
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild has brewed a remarkable new elixir from magical fungi. This potion seems to extend life and keep one looking youthful by subtly altering ancient magical pathways. It appears even common foods and mystical humors play a role in this grand enchantment.

stories.original_headline: Scientists reveal a powerful heart boost hidden in everyday foods
stories.original_summary: Regular consumption of polyphenol-rich foods like tea, coffee, berries, nuts, and whole grains may significantly support long-term heart health. stories.fantasy_headline: Everyday Provisions Hold Secret to Strong Hearts!
stories.fantasy_story: The Herbalists' Guild has discovered that common provisions, like blessed berries and grains, hold a powerful enchantment. Those who regularly partake in these special foods maintain robust hearts and balanced humors. A decade-long observation confirms this age-old wisdom leads to lasting vigor.

stories.fantasy_headline: A Chronicler's Guide to Wondrous Festival Gifts!
stories.fantasy_story: The annual Winter Solstice festival always arrives swiftly, bringing joy but also vexations for gift-givers. Fear not, for this scroll offers a guide to the most wondrous trinkets and enchanted wares. With it, merchants can find the perfect treasures to delight all kinsfolk without worry.
